intro.description: These steps will show you how to create a Test Suite and add Test Cases to it to be executed.

item.title: Open the new Test Suite dialog
item.description:
In the Test Suite Browser, right click and select:
New > Test Suite
from the context-sensitive menu.
Enter TestAdder as the Test Suite name.
Click OK.

item.title: Open the Test Suite Editor
item.description: Double click on the Test Suite in the Test Suite Browser to open the Test Suite Editor.

item.title: Add Test Cases to the Test Suite
item.description: Drag the Perform Addition Test Case from the Test Case Browser into the Test Suite Editor.
